alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 9:18PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brevard County through 1000 PM EDT... At 918 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Suntree, or near Patrick Air Force Base, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa Beach, Satellite Beach and Indialantic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for east central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
